editor

Class CSVAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • ca.queensu.cs.dal.edfmwk.act.DefaultAction
        • editor.CSVAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColumnStatisticsAction, MoveColumnLeftAction, MoveColumnRightAction, MoveRowDownAction, MoveRowUpAction, UnsortAction

    public abstract class CSVAction
extends ca.queensu.cs.dal.edfmwk.act.DefaultAction
    Parent for Actions for implementing changes to the current table selection. Subclasses need only implement the changeCSV(editor.CSVContents, int, int, int, int) method.

    Copyright 2016 CISC 322 Group 7. See the copyright notice for details.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • changeCSV

        protected abstract void changeCSV(CSVContents con,
                                  int startRow,
                                  int startCol,
                                  int endRow,
                                  int endCol)
        Perform some appropriate change on a selected region of the table; subclasses must implement this method. Note that some actions might not use all this information. For example, generating statistics on the currently selected column will likely only care about startCol.
        Parameters:
        con - csv table to change.
        startRow - Index of the first row to change.
        endRow - Index of the last row to change.
        startCol - Index of the first column to change.
        endCol - Index of the last column to change.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ae)
        Perform the appropriate action (defined by changeCSV(editor.CSVContents, int, int, int, int)) on the currently-selected region of the document.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Overrides:
        actionPerformed in class ca.queensu.cs.dal.edfmwk.act.DefaultAction
